issue.title: Let users change their view in the world in more diverse ways

content.raw:
I believe camera view change could be undone, yes.

Agreed that Center All might not be very useful. The only use I can think for it right now is when you have a big environment and would like to quickly switch step back to see everything at once...
content.html:
I believe camera view change could be undone, yes.
